attributes.action: All key/critical workers to be given COVID-19 vaccine. To help aid the economy.
attributes.additional_details: Vaccine for all key workers on priority list to get vaccinated.(Education and childcare workers, Key public services, Food and other necessary goods workers including shop assistance, Transport and border workers, Public safety and national security, Utilities, communication and financial services)
attributes.background: All key workers to be given the Covid-19 vaccine as soon as possible to not only get the economy up and running properly but to also allow all children the chance to have a good education now as they are already so far behind. We need to keep educating children they are the future of this country.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564466
